p: The hulls of ripe pistachio nuts ( Pistacia vera L., Bronte variety) were collected in end-August 2017 by a local farmer in Bronte (Catania, Italy) and identified by Prof. Laura Cornara (Botanist at the Dept. DISTAV of the University of Genoa, Italy). A voucher specimen has been deposited in the ChiBioFarAm Department, University of Messina (Messina, Italy).
